vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σαμψών, ὁ indecl. (Heb. שִׁמְשׁוֹן),
Samson (Jdg.13:1-25 ff.): Heb.11:32.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Samson, "little one of Shemesh [pagan sun god]" or "sunny"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.13.24;
son of: Manoah (H4495); married to Delilah (H1807)
§ Samson, "little one of Shemesh [pagan sun god]" or "sunny"
(Jdg. 13-16), Samson, (Proper name), indeclinable, Heb. 11:32*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
參孫 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "像太陽一樣"
以色列的士師之一, 以其超人的體能而著名 (來 11:32)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
参孙 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "像太阳一样"
以色列的士师之一, 以其超人的体能而著名 (来 11:32)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Sam-sôn «mặt trời nhỏ, có lẽ kẻ hủy diệt » Xem H8123
